price: (Yaa Qureeyshotaa!) Sila kaafiroota keessantu isaan kanneen irra caala moo kitaabota keessa (adabbii irraa) baraaramuutu isiniif jira?
arabic: أَكُفَّارُكُمۡ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أُوْلَٰٓئِكُمۡ أَمۡ لَكُم بَرَآءَةٞ فِي ٱلزُّبُرِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: akuffārukum khayrun min ulāikum am lakum barāatun fī al-zuburi
